# HonuVibe.AI

> Hawaii-born AI education platform bridging the US and Japan ecosystems.

## About
HonuVibe.AI is a bilingual (EN/JP) AI education platform founded by Ryan Jackson in Honolulu, Hawaii. We offer practical, project-based AI courses for entrepreneurs, builders, and curious minds.

## Key Pages
- Homepage: https://honuvibe.ai
- HonuHub (Waikiki learning space): https://honuvibe.ai/honuhub
- Exploration Island (project portfolio): https://honuvibe.ai/exploration
- About Ryan: https://honuvibe.ai/about
- Community: https://honuvibe.ai/community
- Apply to Work Together: https://honuvibe.ai/apply
- Resources / Ryan's Toolkit: https://honuvibe.ai/resources
- AI Glossary (bilingual EN/JP): https://honuvibe.ai/glossary

## Topics
- AI education for entrepreneurs
- Bilingual EN/JP AI community
- Micro-SaaS development
- AI workflow automation
- HonuHub Waikiki learning space
- AI terminology glossary (bilingual EN/JP)
